actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the deduction for two-earner married couples by treating amounts received as a pension, annuity, or individual retirement plan distribution as earned income.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to include retirement income in the computation for the income tax deduction for two-wage earner married couples.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the deduction for two-earner married couples by treating amounts received as a pension, annuity, or individual retirement plan distribution as earned income.
